title: Curvy Conquest
description: A stranger reopens the door to Candy’s past.A mysterious envelope containing shocking revelations.Did her father know too much?Murdered to keep quiet?Her grandmother always claimed her son’s death had nothing to do with an accident.Without solid proof there was no way of convincing the authorities.Still, her grandmother cried foul play.Someone has been keeping tabs on Candy’s life.Now, she holds in her hand an incriminating letter.Those are some pretty bold allegations.Devastated, Candy turns to her pillar of strength for comfort—Max.Some shocking facts are unbearable… and cloud your judgment.Will the crumbling weight of this horrific drama threaten what Candy and Max have?And will Candy’s quest for the truth put her own life in danger?This is Part 4 of 4 of this fairytale BBW romance novel with the right touch of naughty!Get it now.
author: Scarlett Avery
